dict.acceptation: 诚实地；正直地；老老实实；老实说；

sent.orig: Let us admit, and regret, that he honestly believes it impossible to differ from him honestly.
sent.trans: 我们不得不承认，他真的相信凡与他抱有不同见解的人不可能是一个正人君子，这是很令人遗憾的事。

sent.orig: In this employment, the employee shall act honestly, laboriously and to the best of his ability.
sent.trans: 在受雇时，雇员须诚实、耐劳并充分发挥能力。

sent.orig: We hoped that you will deal with our request honestly.
sent.trans: 希望你们能公正地处理我们的请求。

sent.orig: And can you honestly tell me that you don't watch Sampras or Rafter.
sent.trans: 你能忠实地告诉我你不看桑普拉斯或者拉夫特吗？

sent.orig: Often a non-disclosure may arise from failing to answer honestly questions contained in the proposal document.
sent.trans: 未尽披露义务经常是由于没能诚实地回答投保单中所包含的问题引起的。
